title: Sputnik 1
description: The Soviet Union launches Sputnik 1, the first artificial Earth satellite.

title: First Human in Space
description: Yuri Gagarin becomes the first human to journey into outer space aboard Vostok 1.

title: Moon Landing
description: Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin become the first humans to land on the Moon during the Apollo 11 mission.

title: First Space Station
description: The Soviet Union launches Salyut 1, the first space station.

title: First Space Shuttle Launch
description: The first orbital flight of NASA's Space Shuttle program, Columbia.

title: ISS Construction Begins
description: The first module of the International Space Station is launched.

title: Perseverance Rover Lands on Mars
description: NASA's Perseverance rover successfully lands on Mars with the Ingenuity helicopter drone.

title: James Webb Space Telescope Launch
description: The James Webb Space Telescope, the largest and most powerful space telescope ever built, is launched.
